title: Optimization of Electromechanical Skills with Specialized Tutoring
description: MET offers interactive electromechanics tutoring, focused on developing skills in Arduino, AutoCAD and SolidWorks to optimize learner productivity.

title: Creation of prototypes with electronic softwares
description: MET realises some of their projects using electronic softwares such as Mount River, MPLAB. These softwares are used to program a microcontroller to control a system depending on the activities to be performed by the prototype.
